mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At TopalX Driving School, we are dedicated to training responsible and confident drivers who actively contribute to road safety. We offer personalized, high-quality driving courses using modern teaching methods and updated vehicles to ensure complete and effective training. However, you don’t have to just take our word for it. Our pride comes from the reviews and success stories of our students who have not only obtained their driving licenses but also enjoyed a learning experience tailored to their needs. We invite you to visit the testimonials section on our website to discover authentic accounts that highlight the quality of our services and their positive impact on the driving community.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: Our team consists of experienced professionals passionate about driving education. Meet the people who make it all possible.

companyDescription.title: About Us
companyDescription.paragraph1: Founded by a driving instructor with over 25 years of experience, TopalX is the result of a shared passion with his wife for quality driving education. The school's name comes from the family name, bringing with it a tradition and dedication to road safety and education. The founder's dedication, stemming from decades of experience in driver training, is deeply embedded in every aspect of the courses offered.
companyDescription.paragraph2: The goal of TopalX is not only to prepare students to pass the driving test but also to cultivate responsibility and deep respect for traffic rules. Each training program is meticulously planned to ensure that every student understands not only the mechanics of driving but also the importance of preventive behavior on public roads. By using teaching methods tailored to the individual needs of students and employing a modern vehicle fleet equipped to high standards, the school ensures that every new driver is fully prepared to navigate various traffic situations safely and confidently.
companyDescription.paragraph3: Additionally, TopalX places great emphasis on developing ethical behavior behind the wheel, promoting values of respect and caution essential for harmonious coexistence in traffic. With a team of passionate and dedicated instructors from various branches of the automotive field, the school guarantees a complete and deeply human learning experience aimed at developing responsible drivers who are aware of their impact on the community.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how TopalX Driving School collects, uses, and protects your personal data when you use our website and services.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how TopalX - Driving School collects, uses, and protects your personal data when you use our website and services.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the following personal data through the contact form:

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Data Collection
purpose.content: We use this data to respond to your inquiries and to provide you with information about our services.

storage.title: 4. Data Storage and Protection
storage.content: Your data is stored securely and will not be shared with third parties without your consent. The data is kept for the necessary period for the purposes for which it was collected, after which it will be deleted.

rights.title: 5. User Rights
rights.content: According to GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: Right of access: You can request access to your personal data that we hold.
Right to rectification: You can request the correction of your personal data if it is inaccurate.
Right to erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal data.
Right to restrict processing: You can request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.
Right to data portability: You can request the transfer of your personal data to another operator.
Right to object: You can object to the processing of your personal data.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at:

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.intro: These terms and conditions govern the use of the website and the services offered by TopalX Driving School. By using this site, you fully accept these terms and conditions.

services.title: 1. Services Offered
services.content: TopalX Driving School offers theoretical and practical courses for obtaining a category B driving license. All services are provided in accordance with the applicable legal regulations.

registration.title: 2. Registration
registration.content: To enroll in our courses, you must complete the registration form available on the website or contact us by phone and provide accurate and complete information. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel registration in case of violation of the terms and conditions.

payments.title: 3. Payments
payments.content: The payment for the courses is made according to the information presented on the website. All payments are non-refundable, except in cases of course cancellation by the school.

cancellation.title: 4. Cancellations
cancellation.content: If you wish to cancel your participation in the courses, you must notify us in writing at least 7 days before the course start date. Cancellations made after this period will not be refunded.

privacy.title: 5. Privacy
privacy.content: Personal data collected through this website will be used exclusively for processing registrations and communicating with students. Data will not be shared with third parties without your consent.

liability.title: 6. Liability
liability.content: TopalX Driving School is not liable for any accidents or damages occurring during practical courses, except in cases of negligence on the part of the instructors.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications to the Terms and Conditions
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page and will take effect immediately.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For any questions or concerns regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at:

members.name: Constantin Topala
members.description: With over 25 years of experience, the founder of the driving school and also an instructor, Mr. Topala is a dedicated leader and a true visionary. With his vast expertise and integrated approach, he ensures excellence in driver education for all learners. Over the years, he has trained thousands of responsible and confident drivers.

members.name: Raluca Topala
members.description: Secretary and wife of the driving school manager with over 10 years experience. Raluca is extremely sociable, empathetic and always willing to help everyone. She handles all administrative aspects with professionalism and efficiency, ensuring that every learner has a pleasant and hassle-free experience.

members.name: Stefan Puscasu
members.description: Mr. Stefan, with more than 15 years of experience, is known for his exemplary patience, consummate professionalism and ability to inspire confidence in his learners. He dedicates his time to ensure that each learner fully understands the rules and techniques of driving, offering practical advice and constant encouragement.

members.name: Laurentiu Marin
members.description: Mr. Laurentiu stands out for his vast experience in the field and his calm and methodical approach in training future drivers. Dedicated and passionate about his profession, Mr. Laurentiu is a true mentor to the trainees. With a friendly and open attitude, he creates a comfortable and stimulating learning environment.

members.name: Viorel Neagu
members.description: Mr. Viorel has a wealth of experience in the field. He is appreciated for his effective pedagogical methods and his dedication to preparing learners to become responsible and knowledgeable drivers. Viorel is always up to date with the latest legislative changes and ensures that all his trainees are well prepared for their theory exams.
